attributes.action: Re-impose the requirements for face coverings to be worn
attributes.additional_details: I believe that the use of face coverings will assist in reducing the spread of coronavirus. The current system of personal choice isn’t working
attributes.background: Re-introduce the mandatory wearing of face coverings

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Keep face covering mandatory in indoor public settings beyond 19th July 2021:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590616

Enact ‘Plan B’ to help keep people and our NHS well this winter.:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599507
